intro.title: This is your Disease Tracking Dashboard
intro.description: Here, you can monitor and analyze disease data, manage datasets, and gain insights into global health trends.

actions.title: What would you like to do today?
actions.statistics: üìä View Statistics: Explore disease trends and visualize data on an interactive map.
actions.manage_data: üìÇ Manage Data: Review existing records or import new data as an admin in the database.
actions.analyze: üîç Analyze Trends: Dive deeper into the data to uncover patterns and insights.

home.navigation_tip: Use the sidebar to navigate through the dashboard and access the tools you need.

help_messages.welcome: Personalized greeting showing your login status and user name.
help_messages.dashboard_intro: Overview of the dashboard's purpose and capabilities.
help_messages.action_statistics: Access interactive visualizations and maps of disease data.
help_messages.action_manage_data: Administrative functions for managing the disease database (admin only).
help_messages.action_analyze: Advanced analytical tools for in-depth data exploration.
help_messages.navigation_tip: The sidebar contains all available sections of this application.

db_viz.title: Database Visualization üî¨

admin_section.error_message: Failed to update database, please ensure there is no empty field.

db_viz.error_message: No data available, please upload data inside the database.

help_messages.update_button: Click to save all changes made to the database. This will update the server with your modifications.
help_messages.data_view: This is a read-only view of the current disease data in the database.
help_messages.progress_bar: Visual indicator showing the progress of database update operation.

csv_import.title: CSV Import ‚Üß
csv_import.preview_title: Preview of the uploaded CSV file:

help_messages.file_uploader: Upload a CSV file containing disease data. The file should have columns matching the required format.
help_messages.import_button: Click to import the displayed CSV data into the system. This will send the data to the server for processing.
help_messages.preview: This shows the first 5 rows of your CSV file to verify the data looks correct before importing.

manage_users.title: Manage Users üë§
manage_users.empty_fields_error: Please ensure there are no empty fields before updating.
manage_users.update_error: Failed to update users. Please ensure there are no empty fields.
manage_users.no_data_error: No user data available or API error.

help_messages.update_button: Click to save all changes to the user database. This will update the server with your modifications.
help_messages.readonly_view: This is a read-only view of all registered users in the system.
help_messages.progress_bar: Visual indicator showing the progress of user database update operation.

help_messages.cases_input: Enter the current number of confirmed cases
help_messages.deaths_input: Enter the current number of deaths
help_messages.recovered_input: Enter the current number of recovered cases
help_messages.country_select: Select the country for prediction analysis
help_messages.predict_button: Click to generate AI-powered predictions for next month
help_messages.progress_bar: Prediction in progress - the AI model is analyzing trends

errors.mismatch: New password and confirm password do not match.

help_messages.language_selector: Change the application language (available for Swiss users only).
help_messages.password_toggle: Click to show/hide the password update form.
help_messages.new_password: Enter your new password (minimum 8 characters recommended).
help_messages.confirm_password: Re-enter your new password to confirm it matches.
help_messages.password_update: Submit your new password after filling all fields.
help_messages.logout: Click to securely log out of your account.

data_fetch.api_error: Failed to fetch data from the API: {error}
